website_summaries.verdict: One of the best beginner level sets on the market, it has everything you’ll need to start brewing.
pros: Kit includes an easy-to-understand set of instructions, which is helpful for beginners
Has a full recipe kit to create an amber ale beer that tastes good, especially considering it’s found in a beginner-level brewing kit
cons: This kit creates about 5 gallons of beer, which is a little less than others

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend to buy this kit for starters
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend to buy this kit for starters. My bf always wanted to brew beer and always mentioned it to his friends and family but never started it until I bought this kit for his Christmas & birthday gift (it counted for two important events ha-ha). He was so happy to see that the box included everything to start brewing beer. Of course you will need to buy extra accessories if you go for special size of glass bottles of different airlock. Since then he continues brewing and experimenting with other ingredients that can be found in local brewing stores and he is still using all the things that were included in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Velarde

customer_reviews.title: Crap lids. Not airtight. No point in paying for a airlock that you can observe wet it's working or not.
customer_reviews.text: A friend got one after see mine. I bought and sent one tp my sister. I'm embarrassed because both had loose lids for the fermentation tank. That makes no sense having a fermentation lock that becomes useless. I got a tight lid. Why did they become extinct? Off of my recommendation two dear to me got shafted. Not fair.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: great product and I could definitely see myself buying a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ever home brewing. The kit came with everything basic needed to start brewing although I wish it would have came with a hydrometer/cylinder/beer thief, thermometer, and maybe some adhesive fermenter thermometers. Overall, great product and I could definitely see myself buying a secondary carboy and a few more recipes. Note: The directions are pretty straight forward although I believe the video they have on YouTube is definitely easier to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal for price.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to start brewing. Love that it comes with kettle and bottle capper, which you usually have to buy seperate. Also have support system if you have questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect experience
customer_reviews.text: The only thing better than the price of this is the customer support you get. To enthusiastic thumbs up. I love the kit and I can't say enough about the people behind the business. I strongly recommend doing business with this team
customer_reviews.author: MEtteldorf

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my brother in law, he's been drinking more and more IPAs and craft brews so it made the perfect holiday gift and a very unique activity.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: This kit comes with instructions that are easy to follow and any questions I had were answered ...
customer_reviews.text: finished my first brew a few weeks ago. This kit comes with instructions that are easy to follow and any questions I had were answered quickly through online searches or calling Northern Brewery to speak to a Brew Master. If you are new to home brewing craft beer or are ready to take the plunge and start crafting your own brew, this is a great kit to begin the adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Lear Heaslet

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit! I just started getting into home brewing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Kit! I just started getting into home brewing and this is the best extract brewing kit there is. It is the best price too. They use good ingredients and the kit comes with quality equipment. Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Sds3r1

customer_reviews.title: it was good! I gave my wife a taste
customer_reviews.text: Kit arrived quickly...it was clean and complete...I was brewing that very weekend...2 weeks later I bottle...2 weeks later I crack the first...it was good! I gave my wife a taste...she said "wow...that is real beer!". (Not sure what she was expecting...always good to talk down the first batch). Thanks Northern Brewer and Amazon for easily and positively kicking off my new hobby!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Company - Great product!
customer_reviews.text: For a first time brewer like myself this is the perfect package. It contains pretty much everything you need. I just tried the first bottle of Block Party Amber Ale that came with the kit and it is great. I brewed exactly as the recipe instructed and encountered no problems. I have talked with the brew masters on a couple of occasions with general questions I had, and they were very understanding and helpful. This is a great company and a great product. I will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift - Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas, as he's always wanted to brew his own beer. I also bought him a book for beginners, since he is very technical and needs everything to be perfect. He brewed the CHINOOK IPA and it turned out pretty good. He since then has went to our local beer store to make another IPA. I messaged the company after the first time using this, when the tube to transfer the beer into the bottles was leaking. I asked if they could send a replacement and they sent a full new brewing kit. They were extremely helpful and sent this out right away. Thank you for a lovely gift!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Jok

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit - bad lid
customer_reviews.text: It's a good kit overall. You'll want to get a hydrometer separately. Fermenter lid is super tight and rigid. Mine cracked the first time I attempted to open my bucket, without I feel much incompetence on my part. This isn't my first brewkit. I had to cover it with plastic wrap until a replacement lid arrived. Also it's pretty stingy on the soap. Be sure to get more Star San on the side. You'll need it anyway. The instructions were fine. Perhaps a bit overly simplistic. Good enough for a beginner kit anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kestrel

customer_reviews.title: Missing essential stainless steel kettle.
customer_reviews.text: WARNING this so called essential kit is missing very essential Kettle so you have to buy it. They defended this by saying Kettle was not listed as if a beginner would know. NO RETURNS you don't know this till you click on return. They say 100% guarantee NOT! Manager started reply by telling me I had received the new updated kit! That meant no stainless steel kettle. Manager finally agreed to pay return then blamed Amazon for being unable to provide label! I was told it was my problem. I also found complaints about lids on plastic buckets almost impossible to seal. They are out to make money on Pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to do, beer was great.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome I got 2 growlers filled and 30 something bottles. I forget the number. But this batch will make roughly 53 beers start to finish. Super easy steps to follow and tons of YouTube videos along with some on their website. Keep everything clean and follow the steps and you will have some beer. My friends and family were all impressed along with my co-workers. I'm excited to do another batch again soon. Make sure you order the right amount of bottles ahead of time or get some from a local brew supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Dude

customer_reviews.title: Cheap equipment!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received this product a day early in the mail than what it said. Not so excited to open box and find a dent in the lid of the kettle. Then during the cleansing process of the ferment bucket I struggled to get the lid back off and ended up cracking the lid which rendered the bucket useless because it didn’t have an air tight seal. That’s money down the drain along with the beer. Can’t say anything about the taste of the beer never made it that far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: fermentation buckets leak
customer_reviews.text: Both the spigots in the fermentation buckets leaked, meaning I had to go buy a new carboy/bucket to actually ferment. And yes, I did put in the spigots on right, rubber O-ring on both sides. They leak because the holes are drilled too far down so the spigots make contact with the floor, bending them upwards and leaking regardless of how good your spigot install is.
customer_reviews.author: R. A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, Lid Doesn't Seal
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a lot of goodies! It will really get you started in your home brew journey. Fast delivery, nicely printed and understandable instructions. Good price. However, the lid on the fermentation bucket doesn't seal... have a brew in there now and fermentation is very brisk...however, the airlock isn't bubbling. I have verified fermentation. This product would easily be 5 stars....if they offered a different drilled lid that SEALS properly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Massa

customer_reviews.title: Great beer kit, instructions could be more clear.
customer_reviews.text: I love the customer service through text messaging and emailing. I would have given it 5 stars if: 1. Some of the essential equipment was involved, such as a hydrometer, a 5-gallon lid opener (it was very hard to open up a lid) and more sanitizer. 2. Some of the instructions were unclear and I had to look between their website and the sheets of paper included. For instance, the paper didn't include when during the boiling process to throw in the hop, and the website did. If both sources had consistent instructions, I would have easily given this 5 stars. Overall, a good kit and made some fine beer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great no frill, beginner kit
customer_reviews.text: I had the Chinook IPA brewing started in no time as instructions were easy to follow. There was an issue with the label of malt extract as the instruction called for 6lbs but label said 3lbs. I texted Northen Brewer and they quickly confirm with me that it was in fact 6lbs, just label was printed wrong. I then followed the steps and soon enough i had the wort in the fermenter, about 3hrs later. And 3 weeks later i had a great tasting beer to share with friends and family. Likes: Easy to follow instructions. All ingredients for a tasty IPA are included. Great customer service Dislikes: Maybe better kettle, as the one provided is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: T.  Le

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for a new addiction.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one night when I was drunk. Now we’ve brewed 10 batches of beer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Newman

customer_reviews.title: If you are reading this Buy This Product.  You will thank me!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made on Amazon. I bought this starter kit to try my hand in brewing and I instantly fell in love with the process. I have quickly moved above and beyond this kit, but this is a great kit to start learning on. Would highly recommend this kit to anyone that is looking at trying to brew their own beer. Also the Block Party Amber Beer that is included is really good. I received numerous compliments from people that tried one out.
customer_reviews.author: jstep

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Bought it for my boyfriend who loves to tinker and loves beer. Something he had attempted to dabble in before but bought a much cheaper kit and it had been an “okay” experience. The reviews I read for this kit were pretty outstanding so i went for it. So much fun!! He absolutely loves it now, and we are on to brewing a second recipe. The kit comes with a really delicious amber ale. The only thing we needed to buy outside of what it came with was empty glass bottles. Came with bottle caps and a way to seal them on!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad design with lid
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy their fermenting buckets with lids. The buckets have great reference data on them, but the marriage they have with lid is wanting. I literally had to break off lid to get my brew into secondary fermentor. Special lid tool didnt even work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was a very simple starter kit with very detailed instructions. My first brew with it was very successful and I’m still enjoying the beer! The Amber isn’t the best I’ve ever had, but it had shown me that making beer isn’t as hard as I thought it was! I’m on my second brew as we speak!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bowlin

customer_reviews.title: Excited to brew, missing equipment
customer_reviews.text: The box came in and it looked very user friendly. I brewed with my father when I was little so everything looks familiar to me however the kit did not come with an auto syphon. I’m not sure if someone forgot to add it or if it doesn’t come with one. I’m hoping to start brewing soon after I stop buy the brew store and pick up the missing equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: This is the best quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast, came with a catalog for anything you might need or want upgraded . This is the best quality for the price. Very happy with purchase . Will be buying more from this company in the future
customer_reviews.author: brenna

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it to make beer overseas were beer is not readily available and it super easy and a great hobby. The amber ale kit it came with all my friends loved even the non beer drinking friends. Has everyrhing you need except a hydrometer which is nice to have to measure ABV.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: Half the kit was missing when package arrived
customer_reviews.text: This review isn’t about the actual product, as we haven’t had the chance to use it yet. Half the kit is missing! We received the brew kit today in a box that appears to have been opened and then taped back together. The kit is missing more than half of its components: spigots, cleanser packets, tubing, bottle filler, bottle capper, bottle caps, and airlock. I’m really disappointed as this was a birthday present for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Test the equipment first
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was a good first time experience and I hope to brew more in the future. My bottling went well but my final filled bottle count was about eight bottle less than expected. I determined that the graphics printed on the side on the bucket was not accurate (see image). I assumed that it would be fairly accurate but was not. Beginning home brewers should test this out before they start their brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rupe Wilkowske

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and user friendly kit. Some items slightly damaged within the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: All of the ingredients were incredibly fresh. The kit is fairly priced, intuitive, and I really enjoyed it. The only issue was the bottle brush bristles were pretty bent up and the kettle/lid were a bit scratched and dented. The bottle brush isn't really a big deal, but I was looking forward to the kettle and was a bit disappointed. They didn't appear to have been used nor do I suspect damage occurred during shipping. All things considered, I would recommend the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Blumply

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this
customer_reviews.text: For one my rubber stopper for my second bucket did not come, Second my bucket does not snap shut. Do NOT expect your bucket to air seal and make good quality beer cause it does not! Do NOT order this kit. Go with ordering glass for fermenting.
customer_reviews.author: Lana M. Haley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THE NEWBIE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these kits for my good friend and I to finely make home brew and mead. with out a doubt it comes with every thing you need except the beer bottles. Very good instructions! shipped on time and well put together. The only thing we could not fully understand was how to read the hydrometer but we think our beer will be @ 6% I ordered more items from this supplier for making more mead and one more batch of Block Party Ale. I hope who ever orders this kit has as much fun as my friend and I did!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph huber

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level kit.
customer_reviews.text: First and only brew kit I've ever bought, so not an expert. But it came with all the essentials you need except bottles, which it states in the description. Not a problem since you can order those from Amazon too, or do like I did and order 24, but then collect the other 24 from what you drink while you wait for the first batch to finish fermentation. Clear and easy to follow instructions. No complaints at all and I'm happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for an electric stove
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset.... this is not for an electric stove and I wish I would’ve known that before brewing... didn’t even get to add the malt extract. Now I have to get more grains and a steeper bag and start all over :( happy Sunday to me! Wasted 3 hours of my day. Very easy to read and follow though. Was really looking forward to trying this in a month...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get more than you paid for, good times with family and friends!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. It's so much fun to watch your own brew. Also I love sharing my first batch with family and friends. We are still waiting on the second batch.
customer_reviews.author: Debray58

customer_reviews.title: Easy and user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Northern Brewer for my significant other for Christmas. We finally used it and love it. When have made two different beers with it. The first was the amber that came with the kit and the second was a milk stout that we purchased from a local shop. It is easy to use and clean afterwards. Would recommend this as a gift for anyone interested in playing around with beer making.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions. tastes great. need to buy some additional items such a cheesecloth, cleaning solution, etc. Father's Day gift - Hubby likes it. I would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The beer was great! I don't drink beer but the amber ale was great! My boyfriend says it was easy to follow the steps and had a little help by his dad who makes beer often.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: A few things.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the chance to try it yet. Will be brewing with in a few days but so far everything seems to be ok. Only one (1) thing that really should be brought to new buyers attention. The boiling temps. In information sent with kit it does not say anywhere what it’s meant to be. I only know this because I am friends with a master brewer. I looked it up
customer_reviews.author: M Vezza

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: The amount of hops and recommended boiling time with them produced an Amber Ale so bitter that I will be emptying 46 bottles of it down the drain. Hops don't belong in Amber Ales, but I followed NB directions to the letter. Besides the mess of making it, the money for the equipment, and your time, I would suggest you go to the Supermarket and buy beer that has reliable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tigrizzable

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my husband...he is going to love it. It has been about 15 years since he use to make his own beer, and has been talking about doing it again. I want to say, I am so impressed with how fast this shipped! That alone is worth the 5 stars. And, the price was great...packaging was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: k.b.b.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome starting kit to step into home brewing. The written instructions are somewhat confusing and leave a few things out, but Northern Brewing has multiple outlets like YouTube and their help line that will help you get through the process easily. Beer was pretty solid for the Amber Ale. Pro tip— soak your tubing in warm water when attaching to the spigot, will make it much more flexible and easier to work with. Will be buying a new recipe kit soon!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I had a great time brewing my first batch of beer with my Northern Brewer kit. The directions were very easy to follow and all the necessary pieces for the entire process arrived quickly. The only thing I would change is the spigot on the fermenting bucket. I would remove it completely. It makes leaks and dripping much more likely. Despite the spigot on the fermenter, I highly recommend this product for anyone looking to try home brewing.
customer_reviews.author: SeymoureButts

customer_reviews.title: Great brew kit
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. First time brewing. Kit and instructions made it simple and beer came out great. Northern Brewer also has some helpful online videos.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. It made brewing beer easy. It was better than expected. He had everything he needed to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Very good starter kit for brewing  your own beer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I feel like I know how to make any beer now lol,great product and step by step instructions =great tasting beer,first batch was delicious I order 5 different beer kits
customer_reviews.author: Fili

customer_reviews.title: Good prpduct for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just received everything and got the beer currently fermenting. Very easy to follow steps biggest thing is to ensure propper cleaning and sterilization. The lid is extremely tight on the bucket the quality of the products and packaging seemed great to me. We will see in a few weeks how the beer turns out!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Durham

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit just needs a thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. Instructions don’t have every step exactly how to do it but they have great online videos walking you through each step. This kit makes it very easy however i would liked to have seen a thermometer in there so you can better know the temp of your water when boiling and steeping. Love this kit
customer_reviews.author: Alex Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit But Package Not Descreet
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this gift for Christmas but was disappointed in the shipment packaging. It big letters and pictures surrounding the box, it did not make the gift very discreet. He new what it was immediately because the box screams it on every side. Be warned that packaging will not be a secret if intended for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great material! Great ingredients! Awesome experience! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: There is more than meets the eye with this beer making kit! I got more than I expected out of it. I am brew master and co-owner of double E brewing. If you are a beginner OR an experienced brewer, this is the perfect kit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The price is great for a starter brewer kit that has everything needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and the recipient loves it. They have made several batches since December 2017. There are plenty of recipes for it. The price is great for a starter brewer kit that has everything needed to make some fine beers.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Starter Kit!

customer_reviews.title: Great home brew starter kit

customer_reviews.title: Great introduction to brewing

I just opened a bottle from my first batch and am very satisfied. I highly recommend this if you are curious about homebrewing but nervous about going out on your own and trying to brew from scratch.

product_meta.title: Northern Brewer - Essential Brew. Share. Enjoy. HomeBrewing Starter Set, Equipment and Recipe for 5 Gallon Batches (Block Party Amber)
feature_bullets: Highest Rated Starter Kit! The Northern Brewer Brew. Share. Enjoy Homebrew Starter Kit is perfect for holiday gifts and beginners, complete with foolproof instructions.
This all-in-one kit includes everything you need to start brewing beer at home today including siphonless fermenters and our Block Party Amber Ale recipe kit.
*Please Note: Due to inventory constraints in these unusual times, bucket design may be different than pictured.

Block Party Amber: It's deep garnet glow accommodates friendly flavors of toasty bread crust, caramel, and an inkling of floral and herbal hop character. Paired with affable neighborly company, Block Party Amber Ale is a true crowd pleaser.

Kit Includes: Block Party Amber Ale recipe kit, 6.5 gallon fermentor w/ spigot, lid & Bubbler airlock, Bottling Bucket w/Spigot assembly, bottle filler, 21” Stainless Spoon, 5 ft. Siphon Tubing, Cleaner/Sanitizer - Fermenter's Favorites Oxygen Wash, Bottle Brush, Royal Crown Bottle Capper & Caps (60ct.) Yields 5 gallons of finished beer, filling 50 twelve ounce bottles.
